hero.title: About Brass Tech
hero.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 2003
hero.description: Brass Tech is a leading precision components manufacturer dedicated to delivering high-quality engineered solutions for automotive, aerospace, and pneumatic sectors. With advanced CNC technology and a commitment to excellence, we transform complex engineering challenges into precise, reliable components.

meta.title: Brass Tech - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 2003
meta.description: Specialized precision component manufacturer with advanced CNC technology, serving automotive, aerospace, and pneumatic industries with ISO 9001:2015 certified quality.

items.content: Brass Tech is a premier precision components manufacturer specializing in custom engineering solutions for automotive, aerospace, and pneumatic industries. Founded in 2003, we leverage advanced CNC technology and a rigorous quality management system to deliver exceptional components that meet the most demanding specifications.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design analysis and prototype development using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precise material sourcing and evaluation to ensure optimal performance and durability

items.title: Precision Machining
items.description: Advanced CNC machining with multi-axis capabilities for complex component manufacturing

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Rigorous inspection and testing using advanced metrology equipment

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Advanced surface finishing techniques to enhance component performance

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and efficient logistics ensuring safe, timely component delivery
